name: Dark Friday
description:
Ever imagined being trapped inside of a clothing store ?

What would you feel if you couldn't find the way you came in?

The main entrance from which you got in is nowhere to be found and now your only way out is blocked... Use your senses and trick anything inside into believing you are part of the store.

While you are there, shop for the most fitting clothes, but be careful! Are you really alone in here? Don't browse for too long, as in between aisles, bored ghosts seeking to welcome you into the mannequin family..

When there is nowhere to run, hold your breath and freeze to mimic the inanimate  mannequins to hide from your pursuers!

  • WASD : Move
  • E : pick up / read
  • F : toggle flashlight
  • C : crouch
  • Space : hold breath and stay still
  • Escape : quit
